title: Windows.Vista.Ultimate.SoundSchemes-THEORY.rar
description:
The new sound schemes released on Windows Update for Ultimate users, uploading here for those with other versions of Vista or XP. Why you need to pay for Ultimate for these I don\&#039;t know, but they are very high quality and really nice sounds, so enjoy :)

Aritheory


Instructions
------------

1. Unpack into &#039;C:WindowsMedia&#039; or wherever your Windows folder is located.
2. Choose the sounds from the Sounds control panel.
3. Enjoy.

P.S The &#039;Pearl&#039; startup/shutdown sounds make me cry.
